function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of compelling evidence for significant global GHG emissions reductions within the coming decade","Impact":"Failure to achieve necessary reductions in GHG emissions from the built environment by 2030","Mitigation":"Rapid development and implementation of effective emission reduction strategies","Technologies":"Carbon capture and storage, renewable energy systems","People":"Global population, inhabitants of built environments","Owner":"Policy makers, architects, engineers"},{"Description":"Compromise of addressing climate change due to other societal and political priorities","Impact":"Inadequate focus and resources allocated to climate change mitigation in the built environment","Mitigation":"Education and advocacy for climate change awareness, integration of climate considerations into policy and decision-making","Technologies":"Data analytics for climate modeling, communication technologies for advocacy","People":"Policy makers, society at large","Owner":"Environmental organizations, advocacy groups, policy makers"},{"Description":"Slow assimilation of green building strategies within existing design context","Impact":"Limited uptake of low-energy/carbon building design principles, leading to continued high carbon emissions","Mitigation":"Training and capacity-building for architects and builders, incentivizing adoption of green building practices","Technologies":"Building information modeling (BIM), energy simulation software","People":"Architects, builders, design firms","Owner":"Professional associations, industry organizations"}]}
